snippet: The United Nations said Mr. Ntaganzwa, one of nine remaining fugitives sought for his role in the 1994 genocide, was arrested this week in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
abstract: Ladislas Ntaganzwa is arrested in Democratic Republic of Congo for his role in Rwandan genocide.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations said Mr. Ntaganzwa, one of nine remaining fugitives sought for his role in the 1994 genocide, was arrested this week in the Democratic Republic of Congo.

headline.main: Ladislas Ntaganzwa, Top Suspect in Rwandan Genocide, Is Arrested
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Africa; Rwanda: Genocide Suspect Is Arrested

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
